snippet: The Obama administration said added money would be an incentive for insurance companies to let people to keep health policies that were to have been canceled.
abstract: White House will offer more money to insurance companies as incentive for them to let people keep insurance policies that were to have been canceled in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration said added money would be an incentive for insurance companies to let people to keep health policies that were to have been canceled.

headline.main: Insurers Are Offered Assistance for Losses
headline.print_headline: Insurers Are Offered Assistance For Losses
